response.overview: As the railroad builders advance unstoppably through the Arizona desert on their way to the sea, Jill arrives in the small town of Flagstone with the intention of starting a new life.
response.tagline: There were three men in her life. One to take her… one to love her —and one to kill her.
response.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
